data.text: You have done many evil things,
I know everything about the people of Israel;
Because they like to do evil things,
It is as though their being proud testifies [PRS] against them.
They will come to worship me, Yahweh,
Blow the rams’ horns in Gibeah town
Israel will be ruined on the day that I destroy them.
Because the leaders of Judah seized some land that belonged to Israel,
And the people of Israel will suffer greatly when I punish them,
I will destroy the people of Israel like [SIM] ◄larvae of moths/cockroaches► destroy wool,
When the leaders of Israel and Judah saw that the people were suffering
I will become like [SIM] a lion [DOU] to both nations;
After that, I will return to my place in heaven
